name: Tingz
overview: Tingz is changing the way people experience the Internet by giving them tools and services to gather content from across the web and distribute it directly to their digital devices and social networks. Tingz offers a surprisingly consistent and easy experience across a wide variety of devices, operating systems and platforms. We think of Tingz as the Invisible Internet, surfacing content in a way that allows people to seamlessly integrate the Internet into their daily lives.
